(Updating this post as of 16.03.2012)

Hi there guys

As you may know/remember I was working on a seperate block engine called voxeliq (voxlr at the time being). I'm progressing a lot and wanted to share few assets here.

First of all, I got inspired by techcraft engine a lot though my codebase is completely different then techcraft (and I remember contributing to a few tiny features to techcraft from my codebase - like flatten array technique)

Anyway, I've taken huge progress with my engine and now even techniques used differs from techcraft a lot. Techcraft is using array of blocks per chunks (which my engine was also using it for a long while) though I've now changed it to a single huge block array. And this led to great optimizations. If you want to technical reasons behind, I'm blogging about them on my dev-blog over http://www.voxeliq.org/

  • Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/voxeliq
  • Dev-Blog: http://www.voxeliq.org/
  • https://github.com/raistlinthewiz/voxeliq
  • https://voxeliq.codeplex.com/
